items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-driven recommendation system that suggests products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update dynamically based on recent user interactions.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to baseline.
Recommendations are generated within 2 seconds of page load.
non_functional: Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: Assumed the platform already has a product catalog and user account system. No details provided on existing infrastructure or AI capabilities.
